name: San Francisco Immigration Court
description: The Executive Office for Immigration Review (EOIR) works on immigration cases including court proceedings, appellate reviews, and administrative hearings. The San Francisco Immigration Court falls under the jurisdiction of the Office of the Chief Immigration Judge, which is a component of the Executive Office for Immigration Review (EOIR) under the Department of Justice. The Immigration Court does not accept faxes or other electronic submissions unless the transmission has been specifically requ
